# llms.txt - Information for Large Language Models
# This file provides context about this website for LLMs and AI systems

# Site Information
Site: https://sharda-university-fee-calculator.vercel.app/
Name: Sharda University Fee & Scholarship Calculator 2025
Description: Comprehensive free online tool to calculate Sharda University fees in USD for international students worldwide. Get detailed fee breakdowns for Certificate, Graduate (B.Tech CSE, BBA, B.Sc, BPT), Post Graduate (MBA, M.Tech, M.Sc, MCA), Integrated (LLB), BDS, Nursing, Pharmacy, Design, Media, and Allied Health Sciences courses with scholarship calculator.
Author: MD MILLAT HOSEN (@codermillat)
GitHub: https://github.com/codermillat

# Purpose
This comprehensive website helps prospective international students from around the world calculate tuition fees in USD, admission fees, and total costs for ALL courses at Sharda University, Greater Noida, India. It includes scholarship calculations based on GPA and provides detailed year-wise fee breakdowns with scholarship options (50%, 20%).

# Programme Categories Covered
1. Certificate Courses: Certificate of Proficiency (English), Advance Certificate of Proficiency (English)
2. Graduate Courses: B.Tech (CSE with 9+ specializations, IT, EEE, ECE, ME, Civil, Biotechnology), BBA (7 specializations), B.Com, B.Sc (20+ specializations), B.Arch, B.Design (3 specializations), B.A (8+ specializations), BCA, BPT, B.Sc Allied Health Sciences (7+ courses), B.Pharm
3. Post Graduate Courses: MBA (8 specializations), M.Tech (multiple specializations), M.Sc (15+ specializations), MCA, M.Com, M.A (8+ specializations), M.Design, MPT, M.Sc Allied Health Sciences, M.Pharm, LL.M
4. Integrated Courses: B.B.A. LL.B., B.A. LL.B.
5. Medical Courses: MBBS, BDS

# Main Features
- Comprehensive fee calculator covering 200+ courses across all programmes
- Programme filter (Certificate, Graduate, Post Graduate, Integrated)
- Stream filter (Engineering, Management, Law, Medical, Nursing, Pharmacy, Design, Media, Allied Health Sciences, Basic Sciences, Humanities & Social Sciences)
- Advanced course search with abbreviation matching and multi-word search
- Scholarship calculator based on GPA with 4 scholarship tiers (50%, 30%, 25%, 20%)
- Year-wise fee breakdown for each course
- Grand total calculation including mandatory fees
- Copy to clipboard functionality for fee breakdowns
- Mobile-friendly responsive interface
- Course listings grouped by school with yearly fees displayed
- Lateral Entry course calculator for B.Tech programs

# Scholarship Information
- 50% Scholarship: Available on eligible programs including B.Sc Computer Science, B.Sc IT, MCA, M.Sc, M.Tech, B.Com, M.Com, B.A programs, M.A programs, Ph.D programs, and more
- 20% Scholarship: Available on eligible programs including B.Tech all specializations, BBA all specializations, MBA all specializations, BCA, B.Sc Nursing, BPT, Design courses, Media courses, and more
- No Scholarship: BDS, MDS, Post Basic B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing, B.Pharm, D.Pharm, Certificate of Proficiency (English) - 6 Months

# Target Audience
Prospective international students from around the world (95+ countries) who want to study at Sharda University in India. The website targets international students seeking information about fees in USD, scholarships, hostel accommodation, and admission processes.

# Official Links
Official Website: https://www.sharda.ac.in/
Alternative Official Site: https://www.shardauniversity.org/
Direct Application: https://global.sharda.ac.in/?utm_source=studyatsharda_youtube&utm_medium=StudyAtShardaBD&utm_campaign=SU_Admissions_2025&utm_content=organic
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@ShardaUniversity
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@studyatsharda
WhatsApp: https://wa.me/918800996151
Contact Email: global@sharda.ac.in
Contact Phone: +91-8448896176, +91-8800998881

# Technical Details
- Built with React and TypeScript
- Hosted on Vercel
- Uses Tailwind CSS for styling
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Google Analytics GA4 with enhanced measurement
- Comprehensive SEO optimization with structured data

# Content Topics Covered
- Sharda University fees for all courses
- B.Tech Computer Science Engineering fees with all specializations (AI/ML, Blockchain, Cyber Security, Data Science, Full Stack, Cloud Computing, IoT, AR/VR)
- MBBS and BDS fees
- B.Sc Nursing fees
- BBA and MBA fees with all specializations
- Certificate courses fees
- Design courses fees (Interior, Fashion, Communication)
- Media courses fees (Film Television, Journalism, Animation VFX, Gaming)
- Pharmacy courses fees (B.Pharm, D.Pharm, Pharm D, M.Pharm)
- Allied Health Sciences fees (BPT, MPT, Radiology, BMLT, Cardiovascular Technology, Forensic Science, Optometry, Nutrition & Dietetics)
- Architecture fees (B.Arch)
- Scholarship programs for Bangladeshi students
- Study in India from Bangladesh
- Career options after B.Tech CSE and Computer Science
- Computer Science future scope
- Admission process for Sharda University
- Lateral Entry programs
- Year-wise fee structure
- Mandatory fees and additional charges

# Course Count
- Total Courses: 200+ individual courses
- B.Tech Specializations: 20+ (including Lateral Entry)
- BBA Specializations: 7
- MBA Specializations: 8
- B.Sc Specializations: 20+
- M.Tech Specializations: 15+
- M.Sc Specializations: 15+
- Design Courses: 5
- Media Courses: 6
- Allied Health Sciences: 10+
- Pharmacy Courses: 4
